FuncDef: This command configures the primary and secondary multicast plane capacities used when the full complement of possible switch fabrics in the system are up. The rates are defined as a percentage of the total multicast plane capacity which is configured using thetotal-capacitycommand.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the percentage of the total multicast plane capacity to be used for primary multicast planes. Values-0.01 to 100.
Specifies the percentage of the total multicast plane capacity to be used for secondary multicast planes. Values-0.01 to 100.

ExtraInfo:
Default: primary-percentage 100.00 
secondary-percentage 90.00 
with SFM5:primary-percentage 87.5 
 secondary-percentage 87.5
